title: Sample, 1960–63
medium:
Medium: Lurex®, natural fiber, insulating glass, linen
Technique: double cloth: front layer, alternation of natural fiber and insulating glass wefts on loosely spaced warps - back layer, more compact plain weave with natural fiber wefts. Two layers bound
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 20.3 x 21 cm (8 x 8 1/4 in.)
description: Warp: gold and silver lurex combined with fine metal wrapped yarn (fine linen at each edge)  Weft: natural fiber, insulating glass
